'''''Algorithms''''' is a monthly [[peer-reviewed]] [[open-access]] [[scientific journal]] of [[mathematics]], covering design, analysis, and experiments on [[algorithm]]s. The journal is published by [[MDPI]] and was established in 2008. The founding [[editor-in-chief]] was [[Kazuo Iwama (computer scientist)|Kazuo Iwama]] ([[Kyoto University]]).<ref>{{citation |title=Editor's Foreword |volume=1 |issue=1 |journal=Algorithms |page=1 |year=2008 |doi=10.3390/a1010001 |first=Kazuo |last=Iwama |authorlink=Kazuo Iwama (computer scientist) |doi-access=free}}.</ref> From May 2014 to September 2019, the editor-in-chief was Henning Fernau ([[Universität Trier]]). The current editor-in-chief is Frank Werner ([[Otto-von-Guericke-Universität Magdeburg]]).

sections.title: Abstracting and indexing
sections.paragraphs:
